verses.text: \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* ye \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* brethren: \w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* sister: Thou hast obtained mercy.

Judge \w your|strong="H7760"\w* mother, judge \w her|strong="H3588"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* wife, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* husband. \w Let|strong="H7760"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* fornications \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* face, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* adulteries \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w between|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* breasts.

Lest \w I|strong="H0559"\w* strip \w her|strong="H0559"\w* naked, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* set \w her|strong="H0559"\w* as \w in|strong="H0251"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* day \w that|strong="H0559"\w* she \w was|strong="H0269"\w* born: \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* will make \w her|strong="H0559"\w* as \w a|strong="H0251"\w* wilderness, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* will set \w her|strong="H0559"\w* as \w a|strong="H0251"\w* land \w that|strong="H0559"\w* none can pass through, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* will kill \w her|strong="H0559"\w* \w with|strong="H0559"\w* drought.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* children: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* children \w of|strong="H0376"\w* fornications.

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* mother hath committed fornication, she \w that|strong="H3117"\w* conceived \w them|strong="H7896"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* covered \w with|strong="H3117"\w* shame: \w for|strong="H0776"\w* she said: \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* go \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* lovers, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w give|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* bread, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* water, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* wool, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* flax, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* oil, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* drink.

Wherefore \w behold|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* hedge \w up|strong="H0853"\w* thy way \w with|strong="H0853"\w* thorns, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w stop|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* wall, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H7355"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* paths.

\w And|strong="H3899"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0517"\w* \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w shall|strong="H0517"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* overtake \w them|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0517"\w* seek \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w shall|strong="H0517"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w find|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0517"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* go, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* return \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* first husband, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H4325"\w* better \w with|strong="H3899"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w then|strong="H5414"\w*, \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1870"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* know \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* gave \w her|strong="H3651"\w* corn \w and|strong="H1870"\w* wine, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* oil, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* multiplied \w her|strong="H3651"\w* silver, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* gold, which \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* used \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* service \w of|strong="H1870"\w* Baal.

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* corn \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* season, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* wine \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* season, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w set|strong="H7725"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* liberty \w my|strong="H1245"\w* wool, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* flax, which covered \w her|strong="H0413"\w* disgrace.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* open \w her|strong="H5414"\w* folly \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H3045"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* lovers: \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* man \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H5414"\w*:

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w cause|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5337"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* mirth \w to|strong="H7725"\w* cease, \w her|strong="H3947"\w* solemnities, \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w new|strong="H8492"\w* moons, \w her|strong="H3947"\w* sabbaths, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5337"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w festival|strong="H4150"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* destroy \w her|strong="H1540"\w* vines, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* fig trees, \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* said: These \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* rewards, \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w given|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w make|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w as|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* forest, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* field \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* devour \w her|strong="H1540"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4150"\w* I \w will|strong="H7673"\w* visit upon \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Baalim, \w to|strong="H4150"\w* whom \w she|strong="H2320"\w* burnt incense, \w and|strong="H4150"\w* decked herself \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* earrings, \w and|strong="H4150"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* jewels, \w and|strong="H4150"\w* went after \w her|strong="H3605"\w* lovers, \w and|strong="H4150"\w* forgot \w me|strong="H3605"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord.

\w Therefore|strong="H0834"\w*, behold \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* allure \w her|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* lead \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* wilderness: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* heart.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w her|strong="H5921"\w* vinedressers \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* place, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* valley \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Achor \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* opening \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hope: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* sing \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* youth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* coming \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt.

\w And|strong="H3820"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* day, saith \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord, \w That|strong="H3651"\w* \w she|strong="H3820"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* call \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: \w My|strong="H5921"\w* husband, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w she|strong="H3820"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* call \w me|strong="H5921"\w* no \w more|strong="H3651"\w* Baali.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w take|strong="H5927"\w* \w away|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* names \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Baalim \w out|strong="H8033"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* mouth, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* she \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* more remember \w their|strong="H5414"\w* name.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* field, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* fowls \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* air, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* creeping \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* earth: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* destroy \w the|strong="H5002"\w* bow, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* war \w out|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* sleep secure.

\w And|strong="H6310"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* espouse thee \w to|strong="H8034"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w ever|strong="H5750"\w*: \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* espouse thee \w to|strong="H8034"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5750"\w* justice, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* judgment, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H5750"\w* mercy, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H5750"\w* commiserations.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* espouse thee \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* faith: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thou shalt know \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* am \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Lord.

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w it|strong="H4941"\w* shall come \w to|strong="H4941"\w* pass \w in|strong="H4941"\w* that day: I \w will|strong="H6664"\w* hear, saith \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w*, I \w will|strong="H6664"\w* hear \w the|strong="H4941"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* they shall hear \w the|strong="H4941"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* earth \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w the|strong="H0853"\w* core, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wine, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* oil, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* these \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* hear Jezrahel.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sow \w her|strong="H1961"\w* unto \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* without \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* say \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0776"\w* which \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* my \w people|strong="H0776"\w*: Thou art my \w people|strong="H0776"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* say: Thou art my God.
